description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Sausage & Tomato Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Sausage & Tomato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in boiling, salted water as per packet directions. Drain and reserve 1/3 cup cooking liquid.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook sausages for 6 minutes, turning frequently, or until golden on all sides. Transfer to a board and slice thickly. Cool.

Add onion, garlic and zucchini to same pan and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add wine, bring to the boil and simmer for 1 minute. Stir in tomatoes and passata. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add sausage slices and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Stir in pasta cooking liquid and parsley and season.
Toss half the sauce with the pasta. Transfer to serving bowls, top with remaining sauce and serve with parmesan.
